title: Champion Mastery
body: Hi everyone i was just wondering could i get an ETA on the lvl 6 & 7 champion masteries and will there be rewards that come with them? thank you <3{{champion:34}}

replies.body:
If this happens how much champion xp will i need. i.e you need 25000 for 5. I currently have 105000 with ashe do you reckon that will be 6 or 7? 
ps i only have that much because when i started i only played her. Im actually pretty bad w her

> [{quoted}](name=Aidan7787,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6JmEETLj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-23T01:14:50.570+0000)
>
> If this happens how much champion xp will i need. i.e you need 25000 for 5. I currently have 105000 with ashe do you reckon that will be 6 or 7? 
> ps i only have that much because when i started i only played her. Im actually pretty bad w her

The Numbers are on the wiki here :http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Champion_Mastery 

good day <3

> [{quoted}](name=Aidan7787,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6JmEETLj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-23T01:14:50.570+0000)
